meanings.definition: To take a longer route in order to avoid something or to reach a destination
meanings.sent1: We detoured around the traffic jam to get to the party on time.
meanings.sent2: The bus driver detoured due to the fallen tree blocking the road.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel detoured around the sleeping cat to reach the acorns.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts detoured from the lecture to her upcoming vacation.
meanings.sent5: The river detoured around the massive boulder, creating a scenic view.

meanings.definition: To go off the usual path or route
meanings.sent1: The hikers detoured to explore the hidden waterfall.
meanings.sent2: The delivery truck detoured onto the dirt road by mistake.
meanings.sent3: The cat detoured through the garden to avoid the barking dog.
meanings.sent4: His mind detoured into memories of childhood summers.
meanings.sent5: The airplane detoured around the storm clouds for a smoother flight.
